issues.message: ['Pre-coat 24-well plates with GFR Matrigel as described in Reagent setup. The coated plates can be wrapped in Paraﬁlm and kept for ≤2 weeks at 4 oC.'] is not of type 'object'
['Take a six-well plate of undifferentiated PSCs and remove the mTeSR1 by aspiration from the wells to be passaged (Fig. 2a).'] is not of type 'object'
['Wash the wells with 2 ml of sterile DPBS.'] is not of type 'object'
['Aspirate the DPBS.'] is not of type 'object'
['Add 1 ml of accutase to the wells.'] is not of type 'object'
['Incubate at 37 oC for 5 min, allowing PSC colonies to dissociate into single cells.'] is not of type 'object'
['Add 5 ml of warm DMEM/F12 to each well to sufficiently dilute the accutase.'] is not of type 'object'
['Gently triturate each treated well two to three times before transferring the 6 ml of PSCs in medium to a conical tube.'] is not of type 'object'
['Repeat the process with the remaining wells until all cells are collected into the same conical tube.'] is not of type 'object'
['Centrifuge the cells at 1,000 r.p.m. for 3 min at 4 °C.'] is not of type 'object'
['Aspirate the medium from the conical tube.'] is not of type 'object'
['Add warm mTeSR1 to the conical tube.'] is not of type 'object'
['Count the cells.'] is not of type 'object'
['Aspirate the Matrigel from the prepared Matrigel-coated 24-well plate (from Step 1).'] is not of type 'object'
['Plate the cells at a density of 100,000–150,000 cells/well in 500 μl of mTeSR1 including 10 μM Y-27632 on a Matrigel-coated tissue culture 24-well plate.'] is not of type 'object'
['Place the 24-well plate in a tissue culture incubator and ensure that the single cells are evenly distributed in the wells by gently moving the 24-well plate side to side.'] is not of type 'object'
['Incubate overnight in an incubator with 5% CO2 at 37 °C.'] is not of type 'object'
